languages.text: "Да, я хорошо запомнила. Я сидела с дедушкой когда он болел, и вдруг он сказал про этих кобр. Мне было грустно, но и немного смешно. Он сказал "кобра, в класс!"
"Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about cobras. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Cobra, get to class!' he said."
languages.original_text: "Да, я хорошо запомнила. Я сидела с дедушкой когда он болел, и вдруг он сказал про этих кобр. Мне было грустно, но и немного смешно. Он сказал "кобра, в класс!"

traits.locale_text: "Yes, I remember it well. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just starts talking about those snakes. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Snake, get to class!' he says."

"Yes, I remember it well. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just starts talking about those snakes. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Snake, get to class!' he says."
"Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about snakes. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Snake, get to class!' he said."
"Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about snakes. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Snake, get to class!' he said."
"Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about cobras. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Cobra, get to class!' he said."

languages.text: “当然啦，我很确信。爷爷生病的时候，我会和他坐在一起。那次他说起了眼镜蛇，我当时很难过，但心里又觉得有点好笑。‘眼镜蛇，是鸡！’他就是这么说的。”
languages.original_text: "Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about cobras. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Cobra, get to class!' he said."

traits.locale_text: “当然啦，我很确信。爷爷生病的时候，我会和他坐在一起。那次他说起了眼镜蛇，我当时很难过，但心里又觉得有点好笑。‘眼镜蛇，是鸡！’他就是这么说的。”

languages.text: «Pues claro que estoy segura. Cuando el abuelo estaba malito, me sentaba con él, y una vez empezó a hablar de cobras. Estaba triste, pero fue un poco gracioso. Dijo: "¡Cobra, friega la clase!"».
languages.original_text: "Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about cobras. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Cobra, get to class!' he said."

traits.locale_text: «Pues claro que estoy segura. Cuando el abuelo estaba malito, me sentaba con él, y una vez empezó a hablar de cobras. Estaba triste, pero fue un poco gracioso. Dijo: "¡Cobra, friega la clase!"».

languages.text: 「うん、そうだよ。おじいちゃんはずっと病気だったから、いつも一緒に座ってたの。ある日、急にコブラの話をしたんだ。悲しかったけど、面白かった。『コブラよ、クラスへ行け！』って言ってた。
languages.original_text: "Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about cobras. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Cobra, get to class!' he said."

traits.locale_text: 「うん、そうだよ。おじいちゃんはずっと病気だったから、いつも一緒に座ってたの。ある日、急にコブラの話をしたんだ。悲しかったけど、面白かった。『コブラよ、クラスへ行け！』って言ってた。

languages.text: "Natürlich bin ich das. Als Opa krank war, saß ich bei ihm, und einmal sprach er plötzlich über Kobras. Ich war traurig, aber ein bisschen lustig war es auch. 'Kobra, in die Klasse!', hat er gesagt."
languages.original_text: "Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about cobras. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Cobra, get to class!' he said."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich bin ich das. Als Opa krank war, saß ich bei ihm, und einmal sprach er plötzlich über Kobras. Ich war traurig, aber ein bisschen lustig war es auch. 'Kobra, in die Klasse!', hat er gesagt."

languages.text: « Bien sûr que oui. Quand papi était malade, je m'asseyais près de lui et une fois, il s'est mis à parler de cobras. J'étais triste, mais c'était quand même un peu drôle. Il a dit : "Cobras, en classe !" »
languages.original_text: "Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about cobras. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Cobra, get to class!' he said."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr que oui. Quand papi était malade, je m'asseyais près de lui et une fois, il s'est mis à parler de cobras. J'étais triste, mais c'était quand même un peu drôle. Il a dit : "Cobras, en classe !" »

languages.text: "Eminim tabii. Dedem hastayken onunla otururdum. Bir gün kobralardan bahsetmeye başladı. Üzgündüm ama biraz da komikti. 'Sınıfa gir Kobra!' demişti."
languages.original_text: "Of course I'm sure. When Grandpa was ill, I sat with him, and this one time he just started talking about cobras. I was sad, but it was also a little funny. 'Cobra, get to class!' he said."

traits.locale_text: "Eminim tabii. Dedem hastayken onunla otururdum. Bir gün kobralardan bahsetmeye başladı. Üzgündüm ama biraz da komikti. 'Sınıfa gir Kobra!' demişti."
